name: Matrix Transpose
description: Implement a function that transposes a matrix
specification:
Write a function `transpose(matrix: list[list[int]]) -> list[list[int]]` that returns the transpose of the input matrix. The transpose of a matrix is obtained by swapping rows and columns.

Examples:
- transpose([[1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6]]) -> [[1, 4], [2, 5], [3, 6]]
- transpose([[1]]) -> [[1]]
- transpose([[1, 2], [3, 4], [5, 6]]) -> [[1, 3, 5], [2, 4, 6]]
- transpose([[]]) -> []
- transpose([[1, 2, 3]]) -> [[1], [2], [3]]
